verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One with Thee - One with Thee One with Thee - One with Thee Day by day I share Thy riches Thou art ev'rything to me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am one with Thee Lord Jesus One in spirit now with Thee All Thyself I now posess Lord All Thou art now lives in me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now I share Thy human life Lord Filled with Thy humanity All of Thy complete obedience Is available to me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One with Thee in crucifixion On the cross I died in Thee I am dead unto the world Lord And the world is dead to me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One with Thee in resurrection Risen now to live in Thee With that life which is Thyself Lord Now in me Lord even me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One with Thee in Thine ascension In the heavens now with Thee Here a pilgrim and a stranger My true life is hid in Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One with Thee in Thine enthronement Sharing Thine authority Even as I share Thy life Lord I in Thee and Thou in me{/lang-eng}
